programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Lines in the Sand: The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: The Old West Trading Post - Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt: In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

programme.title: Turquoise Fever
programme.desc: Turquoise Fever - Big Drills, Big Deals: A new client approaches the Otteson's about a big order that could lead to them being her exclusive dealer. The family works together to gather enough high-grade turquoise to make the tight deadline. While Tony and Trenton widen the pit at the Apache mine, Emily warns them of the danger, reminding them no amount of money is worth their lives. JaKell and Emily decide to join their husbands on-site to keep them safe and help them make the sale. The brothers turn to an old school technique that gives them only one chance to clear the blast zone and bring down the entire mountain. Meanwhile, at the Easter Blue mine, Tommy, Lane, and Tristan make a big blast and discover a great source of high-grade turquoise just as the buyer arrives on horseback. Can the family deliver enough product to become her exclusive dealer?

programme.desc: Kyle LeBlanc (Jean-Claude Van Damme) is an honorable citizen who winds up incarcerated in Russia after he takes revenge on the man who murdered his wife, resulting in the killer's death. Unfortunately for Kyle, he is assigned to a prison that is renowned for its violence. Controlled by a corrupt and sadistic warden, the facility regularly holds brutal fights between inmates. In order to survive in the prison, Kyle must participate in the battles, even as he attempts to retain his humanity.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps
programme.desc: The story of two outcast sisters, Ginger (Katharine Isabelle) and Brigitte (Emily Perkins), in the mindless suburban town of Bailey Downs. On the night of Ginger's first period, she is savagely attacked by a wild creature. Ginger's wounds miraculously heal but something is not quite right. Now Brigitte must save her sister and save herself.

programme.title: Employee of the Month
programme.desc: The perpetually unlucky David Walsh (Matt Dillon) thinks he finally has it made after landing his dream job at a bank and getting engaged to Sara (Christina Applegate), a seemingly perfect woman. But in a single day, he's let go at work and his fiancée breaks up with him. Livid, David decides to come back to the bank armed and confront his boss, but, as he does so, a heist takes place. David's day somehow gets worse as the robbers draw him into their violent scheme.

programme.title: Eye See You
programme.desc: Recovering from the psychological effects of witnessing a brutal crime, FBI Agent Jake Malloy (Sylvester Stallone) checks into a rehabilitation clinic for law enforcement officers in the remote wilderness of Wyoming during the dead of winter. He soon finds himself helping other patients as a serial killer begins killing them one by one.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Moody was born “Matthew” in Syracuse, NY, into a rambunctious household with six siblings. (They're Irish...somebody had to get a nickname.) He began doing comedy in 1992 and was soon hired by Syracuse's top morning radio show to cover sports and write jokes, his first loves. After six years of working the road, Moody moved to New York City. This millennium has been good to Moody: he's also been featured on Last Comic Standing, Star Search (the 2003 reboot), and America's Got Talent. He's a regular at the best clubs in the land (including the world famous Comedy Cellar) and can be heard on SiriusXM. Moody's material is described as original but universal, and smart without being trite. Couple that with a disarming stage presence & in-the-moment chops, you'll see why he's earned the admiration of his peers for his ability to “go up cold” and turn any setting into a hot room. From corporate outings to pubs, this versatile performer will brighten any event.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Leland Klassen
programme.desc: Raised on a farm in the heart of Canada, Leland quickly learned that shoveling manure and weeding potatoes, although lucrative, wasnít his passion in life. So with absolutely no clear direction or vision for his future, he did what everyone does when they find themselves in that position - he went to University. He wisely chose his classes based on whichever cute girl happened to catch his attention and after several short years of last minute cramming and late assignments, Leland graduated from the University of Saskatchewan with a degree in Anthropology. As you might have guessed, Lelandís university education opened many doors for him in the years to come, but for some reason he was dissatisfied working for a courier as a night shift stock boy. By this time married and with his first child soon on the way, the most responsible and obvious choice was, of course, to pursue a career in the entertainment industry. Starting off at amateur nights and seedy bars Leland decided right from the beginning that he would remain clean despite what everyone else was doing and as a result over the last 16 years Leland has become recognized as Canadaís premier clean comedian. With his unique intelligence and wit, Leland has carved out quite a niche for himself in the world of entertainment. Using his farm boy charm and handsome (although somewhat inbred) Mennonite good looks, Lelandís clever observations and rich life experiences are brought to life in a one-of-a-kind show. LELANDíS CREDITS: Halifax Comedy Fest 2014, Just for Laughs in Montreal, 1999, 2001, 2004 and 2014, Host of Popcorn TV, Featured on Thou Shalt Laugh 5, Host of Comedy Tournament, Co-Host GMA Canada 2009, 2012 and 2013, Promise Keepers Canada, Episode of the US syndicated comedy series ìBananasî, Two of his own television seriesí on the West Coast, as well as Appeared on numerous other programs across the United States and Canada, such as Comedy Network, CBC Television, YTV, Star TV, Global and Discovery Kids.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: Stomping Grounds - "Tin Boat Mafia, Cape Cod
programme.desc: In this inaugural episode, host Ryan McVinney takes viewers to the outer reaches of Cape Cod, Massachusetts to meet a local group of boaters affectionately referred to as the “The Tin Boat Mafia”. This heart-warming family story of aluminum boat owners who share a love for the outdoors and nature is particularly moving during the COVID-19 pandemic. From fishing and surfing to sun bathing and collecting driftwood, this episode chronicles the group's passion for the water and demonstrates why light-weight, easy-to-handle, shallow draft aluminum fishing boats are their vessels of choice for navigating the sandbars of Cape Cod, MA.

programme.title: Grit
programme.desc: Most hunters who have experienced a hunting season in Michigan would describe conditions as wet and cold. And when it's not cold, you're still drenched in sweat from the overwhelming humidity. Upon arriving in Nebraska, we quickly realized that we were far outside our comfort zone. Conditions were hot, dry, and there were ticks everywhere. Not only were conditions drastically different than what we're used to, we've also never hunted this early in the year. What you're about to watch is our first time attempting to chase velvet bucks, our first time filming a hunt, and our first time meeting two new team members. Ready to start searching for a different video to watch yet? Needless to say, this trip had a lot of potential to be a total disaster. But, deep down, this is actually where we're most comfortable as hunters - covering ground in unfamiliar places.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia cooks her mother Erminia's and daughter and daughter Tanya's favorite“Italian-American” recipes: Bubbly hot, cheese-filled Manicotti and aromatic savory Spinach-Meat Cannelloni, served right from the oven in a sizzling old-style baking dish. On the side, Lidia's Italian “tri-colore” salad: Arugula, Tomato, Mozzarella.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Forget about the tomato sauce in this episode. Milan is the hub of Northern Italian cooking: Classic Veal Milanese, Lidia's Chicken Parmigiana, and a contemporary version of Veal Capricciosa, a bone-in veal chop, breaded and sauteed, and accompanied by two sides: an arugula-tomato-onion salad and a warm potato, caper and onion salad.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: “Eat the beans, they taste great, and they are good for you!” This is food at the heart of the Mediterranean diet. Pasta fagioli is a meal sized main course soup. Sausages are cooked with beans, then sliced and served separately. It yields a first course by taking beans from the soup and adding them to an escarole salad. Dessert is roasted pears and grapes, served with vanilla ice cream.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: How long did it take for the chicken to cross the road? Well, if it was coming to Lidia's hous, even if it stopped for garlic mashed potatoes and spinach, it would still take less than 30 minutes to get to the table. Here Lidia teaches us how to cook three classic chicken scaloppina dishes, each in under 30 minutes and it's no riddle!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Filet mignon and chocolate – these don't sound like ingredients to top off a list of Italian-American recipes – but in the kitchen of Lidia Bastianich, it's “Tutti a tavola” to cook and savor two of our most sensual foods: Seared Filet Mignon with Italian style chunky braised vegetables, followed by a rich Hazelnut-Chocolate Ice Cream Truffle.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: A popular dish in Lidia's first restaurant in Queens, New York and still a favorite in her home today, Lidia shares her recipe for Veal Rollatini -- slices of veal rolled and baked until the cheeses ooze out of it. Lidia begins the meal with a classic spinach and bacon salad...and finishes it with sweet crunchy almond cookies for dessert.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Taste and flavor are as much about aromas, textures and story as they are about ingredients. Lidia aims to please all of our senses with this Roman meal fit for an emperor, but enjoyable by everyone, including Lidia's grandchildren. First course, or primi, is spaghetti with anchovies and bread crumbs, followed by pot-roasted herb-scented pork loin the final aromatic touch: braised fennel.

programme.title: Undercover Boss
programme.desc: High-level corporate execs leave the comfort of their offices and secretly take low-level jobs within their companies to find out how things really work and what their employees truly think of them. This Emmy-winning reality series utilizes hidden cameras to provide an authentic view of executives' journeys as they are immersed in the day-to-day operations of their organizations. In the process of this undercover mission, they learn of the perceptions about their companies, the spirit of their work forces and -- maybe -- something about themselves as well.

programme.title: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team are scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after every day repos. In this episode, Sonia and Froy find a payment procrastinating pervert in the park, Matt and Ronnie put the brakes on a rich racecar driver, Matt and Carlos get stuck in the middle of sign maker's gluing process, and Ronnie and Carlos try to reason with an irresponsible retro racist. And finally, on their most dangerous repo ...

programme.title: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Lou's Big Gamble
programme.desc: It's a brand new start for the Operation Repo team when Lou bets big on a high-risk opportunity and sets up shop in Las Vegas! But first, Ronnie and Froy must wrangle a wrestling ring from an lucha libre school, and Carlos and Matt have to break up a Botox party when they go after a car owned by a upper class housewife. Then on their first repo in Vegas, a live tiger stands between the team and a truck, and it seems like Vegas is more than they can handle. If they complete their mission, the payout could be enormous, but will they be able to resist the temptations of ...

programme.title: Interview with the Repo Man
programme.desc: The repo team confronts the toughest challenge yet: one-on-one interviews with an anger management specialist. Lyndah and Froy head to the Hollywood Hills to find a luxury sedan.

programme.title: Heart Attack Panic
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck by a heart attack. Plus, a repo becomes violent under the watchful eye of the finance company. FSC_OperationRepo_S9E11_HD

programme.title: Involuntary Voluntary
programme.desc: Lou and Matt inadvertently become pawns in an elaborate and misguided lesson perpetrated by a cheating husband upon his mistress. Then, Matt and Lou attempt to take a vehicle away from a debtor who is so drunk he doesn't remember agreeing to give his car away voluntarily. And, Froy and Sonia try to take a limousine away from its shotgun-wielding driver and his two suspiciously-dressed passengers.

programme.title: Everybody Just a Child?
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get the worst service ever from a street-side coffee vendor who won't give up his truck. Then, Froy and Lyndah confront a failed actor who has abandoned his dream and his responsibility for his car payments. Finally, it's death from above when Lou, Sonia and Matt try to repossess a vintage Caddy from a model plane enthusiast and his eccentric son.

programme.title: Super-Sonia
programme.desc: Things get a lot more complicated for the team when Sonia snaps and puts herself on the business end of a knife and the gangbanger wielding it. Froy and Sonia wind up in the middle of a relationship dispute with an absent-minded professor who's got too many cars and too many girlfriends, Matt and Froy confront a debtor with a tiny motorcycle and an enormous mean streak, and Sonia and Lyndah find themselves in the middle of a gang dispute gone horribly awry.

programme.title: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah try to negotiate a set of keys away from a raucous group of drunken outdoorsmen. Then, Froy and Lyndah repo a vehicle from a unruly and untalented guitarist. Plus, Froy and Sonia bite off more than they can chew when they try to reclaim an SUV from a confused and embittered former football player.

programme.title: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one-hundred thousand dollars. But after two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company, will the others be able to bounce back in time to avoid a jail sentence?

programme.title: Captain Lou
programme.desc: First, Lyndah and Matt interrupt a debtor's bicycle ride to repossess his Jeep, but when Matt's buttons get pushed, some bikes might get broken. Then, Froy and Sonia negotiate with a sensible debtor who's more trouble than she seems... or is she? And finally, Lou, Sonia, and Froy hit the open water to repo a luxury yacht - but first they'll have to wrangle with a surly sea captain, not to mention the Coast Guard.

programme.title: Win Some, Quarrelsome, Lose Some
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia have an order for a Jaguar behind a retail outlet center, but will the loaders let their precious car be loaded up without a fight? Then, Matt and Froy find themselves amidst a lover's quarrel when a disgruntled wife reveals that she stopped payment on her car because of her cheating husband. And finally, a debtor is nowhere to be found when Lou, Lyndah, and Rob head out to a seemingly quiet neighborhood. The silence is broken when the debtor finally shows up in another vehicle with bang!

programme.title: Incompetent and Unfaithful
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy slip into a gated community for a repossession only to attract the attention of a trio of irate and incompetent security guards. Then, Lou and Sonia come face-to-face with a debtor and her entire adult-league championship softball team. And finally, Froy and Sonia stumble into a bizarre love triangle when it turns out their car is owned by the sugar-daddy of a cheating spouse.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.sub-title: Heli Platform to Platform Jump, Barber Shop, Container Launch
programme.desc: This episode features four co-ed pairs competing as teams. In the first stunt, both team members leap back and forth between two platforms hanging from helicopters with each person transferring up to 10 flags from one platform to the other and then jumping in the water. The three teams to get highest flag total will advance to the next round. In the second stunt one team member is seated in a barber chair and their partner spins them. When the chair stops, they have to get whichever haircut their head was pointing to. There are six haircuts they can get. Teams would advance to the finals if both members got their designated haircuts. In the finale a crane lifts a large container to 200 feet in the air, both team members have to climb rope ladders hanging from the container. Once they reach the container, they both have to scale a narrow ledge on the side, collect two Allen wrenches, and climb another ladder to the top. Once on top, they have to use the wrenches to unscrew hatches and climb down into the container. When they were both inside, they have to touch two pieces of a live wire together in order to blow themselves out of the container and into the water below. The team to complete this stunt the fastest would be the Fear Factor Champions at winning $50,000. This week competing in the Home Invasion is the Frederickson family of Hagerstown, Maryland.

programme.title: Gabriela, Giros del Destino Capítulo 80

programme.title: Mariana & Scarlett Capítulo 23

programme.title: Mariana & Scarlett Capítulo 24

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 63
programme.desc: Teresa y Arturo están por casarse, Mariano llega a impedir la boda, pero ella lo rechaza frente a todos.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 88

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 49
programme.desc: Manuel entristece al saber que Guillermo está internado en el hospital. Magnolia idea un plan para evitar que Guillermo muera. Candy le promete a Meche que la ayudará a sacar a Guillermo del hospital.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 50
programme.desc: Guillermo ya está fuera de peligro, pero pronto se lo llevarán a la cárcel. Meche se pone muy feliz al descubrir que está embarazada.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 45
programme.desc: Natalia visita a Rodolfo San Genis para pedirle que retire la invitación de su recepción a Bella. Renato es contratado por Bernardo para trabajar en el club.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 46
programme.desc: Bella llega a la fiesta de San Genis, él trata de llevársela a la fuerza, pero Sergio llega justo a tiempo y la defiende de Rodolfo San Genis.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 87
programme.desc: Nandito le reclama a su padre que vaya a casarse con Soraya aunque Luis Fernando lo niega. Daniel le ofrece a María que sea la niñera de sus hijos.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 49
programme.desc: Manuel entristece al saber que Guillermo está internado en el hospital. Magnolia idea un plan para evitar que Guillermo muera. Candy le promete a Meche que la ayudará a sacar a Guillermo del hospital.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 50
programme.desc: Guillermo ya está fuera de peligro, pero pronto se lo llevarán a la cárcel. Meche se pone muy feliz al descubrir que está embarazada.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 45
programme.desc: Natalia visita a Rodolfo San Genis para pedirle que retire la invitación de su recepción a Bella. Renato es contratado por Bernardo para trabajar en el club.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 8
programme.desc: José Luis es arrestado por el crimen contra Bruno. Esmeralda le cuenta a Montserrat que fue novia de José Luis y que él es una mala persona.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 9
programme.desc: Alejandro cree que Montserrat está celosa porque lo vio hablando con Esmeralda. José Luis intenta escapar de prisión con ayuda de su amigo Refugio.

programme.title: Lo Que La Vida Me Robó Capítulo 10
programme.desc: Alejandro besa por primera vez a Monserrat, él le pide que sea su novia y ella le da una oportunidad. José Luis se escapa de la cárcel y asesina a su superior para ir por Monserrat.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 44
programme.desc: Teresa continúa su venganza contra Aída y la humilla en la tienda de vestidos de novia. Fernando presenta a Luisa como su novia. Tras una noche de copas, Juana y Cutberto pasan la noche juntos. Mariano sigue creyendo que Teresa aún lo ama y la besa.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 45
programme.desc: Teresa se pone celosa al ver a Aurora cerca de Mariano. La familia de Esperanza se entera que Rubén es un hombre casado y la corren de su casa. Esperanza busca consuelo con Rubén, pero lo encuentra en la cama con Genoveva.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 46
programme.desc: Esperanza descubre que está embarazada y Teresa se alegra con la noticia. Mariano es aceptado para realizar una especialidad en el hospital. Arturo descubre que la nueva conquista de Fernando es Luisa.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 47
programme.desc: Arturo llega a Cancún y confronta a Fernando por ser novio de Luisa. Teresa vuela a Cancún en primera clase, argumentando estar enojada con Arturo. Luisa le deja claro a Arturo que ama a Fernando porque él ya cambió.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 31
programme.desc: Justino visita a escondidas a Antonia, pero Alejandro lo descubre. Mariano permite a José María continuar frecuentando a Ivanna. Julio regresa con su familia, pero les deja en claro que es únicamente para cumplir la promesa que le hizo a su padre.

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 74
programme.desc: Pilar está muy orgullosa de haber pagado a la gente para lastimar a Alfonsina. Sin embargo, no cuenta con la denuncia que interpondrá en su contra. En tanto, Alejandro ayuda a Malena a buscar a Eloísa, pero encontrará algo más. ¿Qué será?

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 75
programme.desc: Alfonsina debe viajar a la Ciudad de México para finiquitar el trato por su departamento y Hugo, que también debe ir, se ofrece a llevarla. Pero no cuentan con Alejandro, quien tiene un plan diferente. ¿Cómo logrará que no se marche?

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 76
programme.desc: Bárbara tiene un ataque de celos al enterarse que Alejandro se marchó con Alfonsina, de modo que el médico acude para atenderla y ella le confiesa algo. Alfonsina y Alejandro siguen fuera de San Andrés, pero surge un percance.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 29
programme.desc: Lía trata de hacer entrar en razón a Violeta para que no se vaya con Max, pero ella decide irse. Antonia le pide a Violeta que no se vaya, pero Max se va antes de que ella llegue. José María lleva a Coralito a inscribirse en la escuela.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 30
programme.desc: Alejandro le informa a Antonia que está embarazada. Violeta y Alejandro le piden a Antonia que contemple abortar, pero ella se niega. Renato le pide a Fausta que le rente un departamento para verse con Cristiana.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 31
programme.desc: Justino visita a escondidas a Antonia, pero Alejandro lo descubre. Mariano permite a José María continuar frecuentando a Ivanna. Julio regresa con su familia, pero les deja en claro que es únicamente para cumplir la promesa que le hizo a su padre.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 12
programme.desc: Vitor y el resto de empleados del Hotel Todo Incluido confunden a dos huéspedes con la famosa banda de asaltantes conocida como “La Banda del Disfraz”. Sin embargo, un poco tarde descubren que sólo son un par de actores de teatro que están ensayando.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 13
programme.desc: Cipriano elige a Vitor como el empleado del mes y como premio, recibe una noche en la suite presidencial del Hotel Todo Incluido. Durante su estancia, Vitor es atacado zombies pero Chava lo rescata.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha trata de salvar al Chino de malas influencias al enterarse de que asistirá a una fiesta de tribus urbanas. María decide remodelar el cuarto de Albertano creyendo que por fin vivirán juntos.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha aprovecha el corte de agua en la colonia para vender unas cubetas que tenía apartadas. María se pone celosa de la nueva ayudante del equipo de futbol, Citlali, mientras que Albertano se la pasa en la banca por ser mal jugador.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: María trata de recuperar el amor de Albertano y hace el ridículo durante su fiesta de cumpleaños. Doña Lucha le da una lección a Rosa Aurora para hacer que se aleje de una mala amistad.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Albertano le pide a María que se den un tiempo y ella decide recuperar a sus ángeles para que la ayuden a superar su rompimiento. Doña Lucha cree que ya es tiempo de que platique con el Chino sobre temas de adultos.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha tiene la idea de hacer un calendario con las abuelitas de la vecindad para ganar dinero. María se somete a una reparación estética para reconquistar a Albertano.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: El Chino consigue trabajo probando videojuegos y provoca que Albertano busque el empleo de sus sueños. María asiste a una cita a ciegas acompañada de Betzabé y las cosas no salen como ella espera.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: María decide contratar un servicio por catálogo para provocarle celos a Albertano. El Chino le aconseja a Albertano que si de verdad quiere a María haga algo contundente para recuperar su amor.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Albertano le confiesa a Doña Lucha que está dispuesta a casarse con María de todos los Ángeles. María debe decidir si quedarse con Albertano o iniciar una vida a lado de un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 6
programme.desc: La estancia de un líder sindical, así como la visita de la actriz Martha Julia generan situaciones de rebeldía y amor en el Hotel Todo Incluido.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 7
programme.desc: Cipriano recibe la triste noticia de que su padre ha muerto. El jefe les pide a todos los empleados del hotel que organicen el funeral para el padre de Cipriano.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 8
programme.desc: Jackie comienza a vender zapatos por catálogo a sus compañeros y a los huéspedes. La actriz Lucía Méndez llega a hospedarse al Hotel Todo Incluido y también a dar una conferencia de prensa.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Lupita descubre que Nico todavía es novio de Karen. Roberta le platica a Alma sobre el engaño de Joaquín. Miguel propone que Diego y Mía canten para pagar la cuenta. Franco encuentra a Mía cantando y la castiga. Joaquín llega en muletas al colegio.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Vico le reclama a Celina por decirle a sus hermanos que Miguel pasó la noche en su casa. Vico y Miguel se hacen novios. Mabel le confiesa a Diego que tiene que sacarlo del colegio. La mamá de Nico se enoja al saber que a Nico le gusta Lupita.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Mía y Roberta corren el rumor que Joaquín es homosexual. Celosa porque Vico va a salir con Miguel, Celina la golpea. Nico decide terminar con Lupita para ayudar a su familia. Pilar ayuda a Joaquín a limpiar su imagen, pero Mía y Roberta arruinan todo.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Alma defiende a Mía ante Franco. Roberta y Jose empiezan a investigar sobre el hermano de Teo. Mendiola amenaza a Pascual con despedirlo si no pone en orden en el colegio. Tomás se preocupa porque Diego quiere auto secuestrarse.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Advertido por Madariaga, León arruina los planes de Diego y detiene a uno de sus escoltas por intentar ayudarlo con el auto secuestro. Roberta se opone a que Mía forme parte de la banda. Diego confronta a Tomás por haberlo delatado.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Mía sufre un ataque al ver una foto de Colucci con Alma en el periódico. Roberta invita a Celina a cantar en la banda. Roberta y Lupita piensan que Jose roba comida para venderla. León le dice a Diego que su mamá decidió no divorciarse.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: José se escapa del colegio, pero al llegar a la casa hogar descubre que será demolida. Roberta se sincera con Jose, pero ella decide no regresar al colegio. Jose se encuentra en problemas cuando un chico la amenaza con una navaja.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 33
programme.desc: María José comienza a buscar trabajo. Hernán le confiesa a Victoria que la quiere. Elena le cuenta a Ulises la verdad sobre sus hijas gemelas, María José y Sandra. Maura besa a Alex.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 34
programme.desc: Fernando y Victoria se besan. María José descubre que Alex envió a Chucho al pueblo donde vive para espiarla. María José es herida cuando unos hombres entran a robar a la tienda donde trabaja.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 35
programme.desc: María José teme que Alex dude que el bebé que espera sea de él. Pedro se entera que María José está embarazada. María José corre peligro después de haber perdido sangre. Alex le pide perdón a María José. Bruno se entera que María José está embarazada.

programme.title: Sortilegio Capítulo 36
programme.desc: Raquel le pide a Bruno que no ayude a María José a recuperarse. Bruno le dice a Alex que ayudará a María José si le cede la presidencia y se divorcia de ella y él acepta sin remedio. María José se entera que Bruno fue quien le donó sangre.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 19
programme.desc: Marichuy descubre que Amador no está ciego. Estefanía enfrenta a Juan Miguel para saber si está enamorado de Marichuy. Isabella lleva a cabo sus planes para hacer que Marichuy arruine la fiesta de Estefanía.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 20
programme.desc: Marichuy se encela la ver a Estefanía besar a Juan Miguel. Viviana descubre que su amante es un ladrón. Estefanía lleva a cabo sus planes para enamorar a Juan Miguel.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 21

programme.title: Los olvidados

programme.title: El Bruto
programme.desc: Un propietario quiere desalojar a sus inquilinos, demoler los edificios y vender la tierra. Contrata al fuerte trabajador del matadero, Pedro El Bruto, para intimidar a los habitantes. La esposa del casero saca provecho sexual de El Bruto.

programme.desc: Una joven cegada por su ambición y traumas del pasado, comienza a conquistar hombres adinerados para drogarlos y robarles.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No hay más cera que la que arde'
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes se enfrentan con grandes obstáculos que superar, uno se ha quedado huérfano y tiene que irse a vivir con sus padrinos, y el otro, despierta de un coma después de 10 años.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Humano es el errar y divino el perdonar'
programme.desc: Durante una sesión fotográfica en la calle una chica sufre un accidente que la deja parapléjica. La madre de la joven culpa a su hijo por el accidente y está dispuesta a hacer lo que sea para que su hija vuelva a caminar.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Quien de tu mal no te advierte, mal te quiere'
programme.desc: Un joven sueña con ser DJ, pero debe lidiar con la extrema disciplina de su abuelo, quien quedó a cargo de él después de la muerte de sus padres. El joven y su abuelo tendrán que aprender a convivir respetando sus diferencias.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A amor mal correspondido, ausencia y olvido'
programme.desc: Una joven tiene una relación con un hombre casado a pesar de que su padre y su amiga se oponen. Poco a poco la joven se va dando cuenta de las falsas promesas de su amante y comienza a aprender que no debe depender de nadie.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'La salud no tiene precio y el que la arriesga es un necio'
programme.desc: Una madre primeriza decide hacerle caso a su amiga y no vacunar a su hijo, pues cree que puede ser contraproducente para el bebé, sin saber que su decisión pondrá en riesgo la salud del pequeño.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No hay peor sordo que el que no quiere oir'
programme.desc: Para sentirse amada, una joven trata de ganarse el corazón de un chico haciendo siempre lo que él le pide, llevándola a los excesos y sin hacer caso de advertencias. Los padres de la joven se darán cuenta muy tarde del error en el que estaba su hija.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. "I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry!" says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Sour wishes she could have a birthday all her very own, her twin sister Sweet grants her wish by forgoing celebrating her birthday. But what begins as a day that Sour has always dreamed of quickly becomes a disappointment when she misses her twin. With Strawberry's help, Sour gives her birthday back to Sweet with a special surprise.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Sour teasing Apple escalates into a "prank war" between the two of them. After the girls' feud disrupts the town, they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend. Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sour's influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality "makeover" on Apple.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl in Town
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor – Merlok the Magician – has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend…MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the “ghost in the machine” she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “Of course I'm the leader…I'm a Richmond.”

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor – the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert – Macy's parents – from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds “The Book of Fear.” It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her “knighmarish” power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest – as they fight off the Whipperella – that they we find out Aaron's true fear – the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: S03 E06
programme.sub-title: The Littlest Berrykin - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, “The Littlest Berrykin,” into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. But before leaving, they must choose which of their three princesses (played by Lemon, Raspberry and Strawberry in royal gowns) will rule the kingdom.

programme.title: S03 E07
programme.sub-title: The Berry Big Relay Race - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the “retrieve” part of the activity—as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search. Orange finds Strawberry, Plum and Raspberry in Lemon's salon, getting their hair and nails done, but something starts going terribly wrong with the appliances.

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.desc: When her store-bought taco shells crack into a gazillion pieces, Lily cooks up a batch of home made taco shells that crunch without cracking. Meanwhile, Avery investigates how chickens lay eggs without cracking them, and makes a trip to see some of the biggest eggs of all – at an ostrich farm! Then our hosts take a crack at cooking each other's favourite omelet, and the results have Matt cracking up!

programme.title: S02 E01
programme.desc: Looking for ways to have a meal in a cup, Avery visits the Gimme A Squeeze Juice Bar to make fruit smoothies. Lily tries her hand at goat milking at a goat dairy farm. Back in the kitchen, Matt demonstrates how to taste two delicious soups in the same bowl.

programme.title: S01 E013
programme.sub-title: Thunder Girl's Basket, The Frozen Trunk, The Invitation - Guess What
programme.desc: EP37: While Thunder Fairy is sliding down the toboggan with Anoki, the puppy Hot Dog steals from him the basket of food. EP38: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on a magic train on the edge of the ice. Crack, crack… they're walking on peanut shells, you'd almost think it were a dump site!EP39: Tijibelle and Tijinou catch up with Rigolini, Super Hero and Thunder Fairy headed to Anoki's new igloo, because he's waiting for them to celebrate his new move!

programme.title: S01 E01
programme.sub-title: Sausage Wants To Play, Hilda Wants To Fly, A Snack For Hilda - Guess What
programme.desc: EP01: Violette prepares a surprise and asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to go get some milk. But Hot Dog, the practical joker, takes the milk can and escapes. Tijinou and Tijibelle set out looking for him.EP02: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive, Violette's farm is in turmoil. In fact, Hilda the hen decided it was time to fly.EP03: Just as Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at the Farm, Violette entrusts them with a little bag. It's Odile the hen's party. But which way should they go to find Odile ?

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.sub-title: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C! Pac and Friends remain loyal to the elderly inventor and, together they uncover a plot by Betrayus to terra-form PacWorld into a world just like the Netherworld prior to invasion and conquest.

programme.title: S01 E14
programme.sub-title: Pac-Pong Fever - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: The annual Pacolympics approach and allow for Aunt Spheria to reignite a Pac-Pong rivalry with her former Pac-Pong rival and wanna-be suitor - Lord Betrayus. Let the games begin!

programme.title: Festival Of Sugary Sweets
programme.desc: When a sugar shortage threatens the annual Festival of Sugary Sweets, the Lalaloopsy friends devise a delicious way to save the day and discover that when you work together as a team, you can make something really special.

programme.title: S03 E08
programme.sub-title: The Berry Best Treasure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the café, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of control—life in Berry Bitty City is impossible! Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! She describes a game where the girls divide into two teams, and each team creates fun written clues for the other that lead to funny objects the girls must collect.

programme.title: S03 E09
programme.sub-title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest! Rallied by a sense of competition and adventure, the girls divide into three groups and set up tents—each convinced they will be the bravest group. They each come up with diverting activities to distract themselves.

programme.title: S02 E02
programme.desc: To win gold at the Ooze-lympics, Avery goes to Chef Dufflet Rosenberg's kitchen to make Molten Chocolate Lava Cake. Lily gets fresh honey at a bee farm. For the final event, Matt challenges them to make extra-oozy, stuffed pizzas.

programme.title: S02 E03
programme.sub-title: Foods that are Hot - Taste Buds
programme.desc: Lily drops in on Chef Lily Pottinger to make a classic spicy Jamaican dish, Jerk Chicken. Avery tests his tolerance for hot peppers at a hot sauce store. Then it's back to the kitchen to see whose fiery wings will bring Matt to tears.

programme.title: S01 E02
programme.sub-title: Susannah's Pillow, A Show For Susannah, The Lost Toy - Guess What
programme.desc: EP04: It's time for a nap but, but Violette cannot find her pillow...EP05: Oh! The mischievous little Thunder Fairy sets off a big storm simply to prevent Rigolini the clown from performing his juggling act in front of Violette the Farmer. EP06: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at Violette's farm. Everyone is getting annoyed with the little puppy Hot Dog who wants to play all the time, while no on has time to for him.

programme.title: S01 E03
programme.sub-title: Too Hot For Super Fred, A Piece of Cake for Thunder Girl, Bouquet For Blossom - Guess What
programme.desc: EP07: Today it's oh so hot and Violette has prepared a nice picnic, right near the well for Tijinou, Tijibelle et Super Hero. She takes out the picnic from her backpack. But a surprise guest joins them ... Thunder Fairy!EP08: It's very hot today at Violette's farm. The sun is shining and there's not enough water coming out of Violette's tap to water her kitchen garden.EP09: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at Violette's farm and ask Violette to sing them a song! But Violette is shy!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Vampire Visitor!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: Challenge Squad | Candy Jousting!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Tube Family Times!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Minecraft Survival!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | A Snacking Expedition!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | HobbyKids' Play Day!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: Camp Spoopy
programme.desc: Pumpkins, goblins and candy...and a puppy in a ghost costume?! Stay right here on Camp Spoopy for all your Halloween scares!

programme.title: Pirate School
programme.desc: On a small remote island surrounded by endless seas, a special Pirate School was opened, where children from pirate families study. Among them are Keel, Fuse and Bobo. The pirate origin does not relieve them from study and normal school duties.

programme.title: The Adventures of Peter and Wolf
programme.desc: A sitcom about the adventures of ordinary schoolboy Peter and talking Wolf connecting the world of people to parallel universes, where there live robots and vampires, werewolves and zombies, giants and aliens, fairies and centaurs, clones and invisible men! The characters will have to solve locals' problems and regularly save the world.

programme.title: Everybody Loves a Moose
programme.desc: An oddball buddy series between an over ambitious boy, Jack and his pal Moose, a melodramatic self-confessed expert in everything. Except he isn't!

programme.title: Angry Bird Toons
programme.desc: Check out Angry Birds Toons compilations! Each compilation has several episodes from your favorite shows including Angry Birds, Piggy Tales, and Stella!

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: The BFF's are a group of teenage friends that together will go through the most difficult situations and become best friends forever! Their adventures are full of hilarious moments, interrupted by a magical character who tries to spread bad vibrations.

programme.title: Lucky Fred
programme.desc: Lucky Fred is a comedy featuring quirky teenager Fred, his morphing robot Friday, and his secret agent neighbor Brianna.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: A slight malfunction causes Chaos Control, and sends Sonic the Hedgehog to Earth. While there, Sonic meets Chris Thorndyke, who helps in collecting the Chaos Emeralds, so Sonic and friends can go home.

programme.title: Future Card Buddy Fight
programme.desc: It is the year 2030, and the stage is the capital of Japan, Chou-Tokyo. Through "Buddyfight", humans have started cultural interactions with residents from other worlds called "Affinity Dimensions". Buddyfight is a game with selected humans as the "Buddyf

programme.title: I'll Get You! Holiday
programme.desc: The action takes place in all year round resort, where Wolf doesn't chase Hare to eat him anymore: now it's all about sports and competition. However, in his crazy chase after recognition and victories the grey hooligan often uses methods that aren't really fair, which provokes awkward and funny situations.

programme.title: Bat Pat
programme.desc: The series follows the comedy adventures of Bat Pat and the Silver brothers Martin, Leo and Rebecca as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home in Fogville, a small town that seems to be the center of all things weird in the world, a veritable magnet to ghosts, mummies, witches, creatures, werewolves and things that go bump in the night. Bat Pat will prove that the supernatural isn't always evil but just misunderstood. Our heroes will come to understand something important: the supernatural “bad guys” are not really bad, but normal people whose actions are misunderstood by the more inhabitants of Fogville and what they really want is... just help!

programme.title: Mia
programme.desc: Mia is a curious and daring 6-year-old mouse who gets excited about everything! She wants to see, try and experience it all! With the help of her grandma, friends and neighbors, she discovers the amazing world around her.

programme.title: Doby & Disy
programme.desc: Adorable twin brother and sister, Doby & Disy, go on adventures in the magic forest together with their friends. They learn different colors, figures, songs and communication skills by solving various problems on the way.

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Fuzzy Tales
programme.desc: An all new take on some classic tales starring the cutest baby animals you have ever seen! A captivating blend of live action animals and beautiful animated backgrounds, Fuzzy Tales offers a fresh approach to mixed media that is adorably irresistible

programme.title: Hogie the Globehopper
programme.desc: Hogie the Globehopper is a fun tv show that will inspire a curiosity and fascination about the world and its people. Hogie and his friends Lorna, Bernie and Floaty travel the world, making lots of friends along the way.

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Reading books is wonderful, especially when you're sitting with a big cuddly Yeti. Nina and Leon, two little mice, are very lucky indeed as every day Yeti reads them a new book.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo the Wildlife Ranger introduces the secrets and wonders of nature and wildlife around us and kickstarts a curiosity and passion for nature in kids. With engaging missions and adventures, kids have fun while learning positive lessons!

programme.title: NuNi
programme.desc: The series is aimed at children 2-6 years old, and although it can be fascinating for adults too, it speaks the language of toddlerhood: a language that is colorful, imaginative and humorous, and one that simplifies complex situations.

programme.title: Raggs
programme.desc: Raggs stars five members of a canine band, Raggs, Trilby, Pido, B. Max and Razzles, and their wise-cracking pet cat, Dumpster, who learn life lessons together in their own cool clubhouse. Each episode follows the characters through engaging , emotional and humorous stories that rock the house and explore issues faced by real kids. Music is an integral part of this fast-paced show, providing a hook to engage and reinforce the educational and pro-social lessons.

programme.title: Get Up & Dance!
programme.desc: Move your body to the groove with these great shows from "Dance Fever", "Badanumu Pop", "DJ Monkey", "nxBeats" and "Urban Tails."

programme.title: Agi Bagi
programme.desc: A peaceful and charming story about living on a crazy double sided planet and its residents - Agingas and Bagingas!

programme.title: LEGO® DREAMZzz: Trials of The Dream Chasers: Private Eye
programme.desc: Mateo steps out of his comfort zone and allows Cooper to read his comic book, but he quickly regrets it when the comic goes missing. Izzie takes on the case as a Private Investigator, but when she dig

programme.title: Pippi Longstocking: Pippi Visits Aunt Matilda
programme.desc: Bloom gets wind that he is being considered as Aunt Matilda's heir to her fortune upon her death.

programme.title: Rescue Heroes: Blackout/Fire Down Under
programme.desc: When a city is plunged into darkness, Billy calls out the Night Force. A series of wildfires rage out of control in New South Wales, Australia

programme.title: Super Dinosaur: The Legend Of The Ghost Lizard
programme.desc: While on a camping trip, DEREK, SUPER DINOSAUR, and DR. DYNAMO discover a mysterious GHOST LIZARD, who leads them to proof of an undiscovered, underground civilization!

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: The Insectibles pretend to be a group of actors in order to gain entrance to the roach's base camp and retrieve a Shrinkinator part. But Zak's delusions of acting grandeur - and a surprise visit from

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: Zak goes on a daring but comically misguided mission to disguise himself as a roach and go undercover. Things take a turn for the worse when he finds he has to go through Roach Boot Camp.

programme.title: Bratz: Transparently Yours
programme.desc: Byron trusts the girls to keep an eye on a case that contains an invisibility formula which is perfume for spies.

programme.title: Pippi Longstocking: Pippi Visits Aunt Matilda
programme.desc: Bloom gets wind that he is being considered as Aunt Matilda's heir to her fortune upon her death.

programme.title: Corduroy: Cute as a Button / Sleep Tight
programme.desc: Lisa and Corduroy learn it is what inside that counts. / Moppy has his first sleep over.
